Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
putz \putz\ (p[u^]ts), n. [Yiddish.] 1. A fool; a jerk. [PJC]
2. The penis. [Vulgar] [PJC]
putz n 1: (Yiddish) a fool; an idiot 2: obscene terms for penis [syn: {cock}, {prick}, {dick}, {shaft}, {pecker}, {peter}, {tool}]
